body: ah yes average NTR stories. I cant let people know my relatiopship so i let fat ugly fuck me everytime he want
So much texts, and yet a very bland story if you as me. NTR at it's finest.

Boyfriend finally follows her and sees where she goes. Sees through outside window what is going on and records it. Brings it to the school's attention (if it is against the rules) and also sends to school's website for students. Bonus is leaving pictures posted everywhere in the be school to be found. Chad gets expelled and scholarship taken away. Girl gets expelled and publicly embarrassed by ex-boyfriend. Ex-bf gets new gf that is not in club. Good end.
Prequel to this is still raw material so if you are curious, here: https://nhentai.net/g/397837/

i feel like ntr authors are running out of ideas and just making stupid plot like this. And she gotta be the dumbest woman of all time if she willing to cheat just cuz the club doesnt allow it, just quit bruh tf???
